attributes.action: not give margaret thatcher a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i withdraw my petition as i see Gilleathain Mclean has a petition already in place which i will sign. Good on this person objecting to this woman this fascist being so honourned
